title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When viewing the preview of a chart, if there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message is not displayed.
EB: When viewing the preview of a chart, if there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user about the issue.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition for the chart. 3. Select a column that does not contain any data.
